body:
GPU3 is really under use if "allow_soft_placement = True" is added. 
It seems multi-GPU-tower style can't assign your work to another machine, it could only parallel work to  multiple GPUs inner machine. If you want to parallel it in a multi-node GPU cluster, you should try [Distributed Tensorflow](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/how_tos/distributed/index.md)
